original_text: And Jephthah came to Mizpeh unto his house, and, behold, his daughter came out to meet him with timbrels and with dances: and she was his only child; beside her he had neither son nor daughter.
korean_text: 입다가 미스바에 있는 자기 집에 이를 때에 보라 그의 딸이 소고를 잡고 춤추며 나와서 영접하니 이는 그의 무남독녀라

sentences.original_text: And Jephthah came to Mizpeh unto his house
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 입다가 미스베에 있는 자기 집으로 돌아왔고

sentences.original_text: and, behold, his daughter came out to meet him
sentences.korean_translation: 그런데 그의 딸이 그를 맞이하러 나왔으며

sentences.original_text: and she was his only child
beside her he had neither son nor daughter
sentences.korean_translation: 그녀 외에 그는 아들이나 딸이 없었다
